simple.gui

Class DrawModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.DrawModule

  • public class DrawModule
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with methods for drawing to a Graphics2D object and manipulating colors.

    Note that if any of this classes color fields are null, when that color is used it will simply skip the operation rather than casting an error.

      • polygon

        public static void polygon(int[] x,
                           int[] y,
                           int numPoints)
        Draws a polygon defined by a series of points. The outline is specified by stroke, the fill by fill.
        Parameters:
        x - series of x coordinates of the polygon.
        y - series of y coordinates of the polygon.
        numPoints - Number of points to use.

      • rect

        public static void rect(int x,
                        int y,
                        int w,
                        int h)
        Draws a rectangle. The outline is specified by stroke, the fill by fill.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the bottom left (visually top left) corner.
        y - y coordinate of the bottom left (visually top left) corner.
        w - width of the retangle.
        h - height of the rectangle.

      • oval

        public static void oval(int x,
                        int y,
                        int w,
                        int h)
        Draws an oval. The outline is specified by stroke, the fill by fill.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the top left of the bounding box.
        y - y coordinate of the top left of the bounding box.
        w - x diameter of the oval.
        h - y diameter of the oval.

        Draws an oval. The outline is specified by stroke, the fill by fill.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the center.
        y - y coordinate of the center.
        w - x radius of the oval.
        h - y radius of the oval.

      • tri

        public static void tri(int x1,
                       int y1,
                       int x2,
                       int y2,
                       int x3,
                       int y3)
        Draws a triangle. The outline is specified by stroke, the fill by fill.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the first point.
        y1 - y coordinate of the first point.
        x2 - x coordinate of the second point.
        y2 - y coordinate of the second point.
        x3 - x coordinate of the third point.
        y3 - y coordinate of the third point.

      • line

        public static void line(int x1,
                        int y1,
                        int x2,
                        int y2)
        Draws a line between two points. The color is specified by stroke.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of one end.
        y1 - y coordinate of one end.
        x2 - x coordinate of another end.
        y2 - y coordinate of another end.

      • setFont

        public static void setFont(java.awt.Font font)
        Sets the stored Graphics2D object's stored font.

      • text

        public static void text(java.lang.String textToDraw,
                        java.awt.Font font,
                        int x,
                        int y)
        Draws text on the screen with a given font, with the text starting at the point x, y. This changes the currently set font for the given graphics object.
        Parameters:
        textToDraw - Text to draw to the screen.
        font - Set's the currently used font for the graphics object.
        x - x coordinate to start the drawing of the text.
        y - y coordinate to start the drawing of the text.

      • text

        public static void text(java.lang.String textToDraw,
                        int x,
                        int y)
        Draws text on the screen with whatever font the graphics object is using, with the text starting at the point x, y. for the given graphics object.
        Parameters:
        textToDraw - Text to draw to the screen.
        x - x coordinate to start the drawing of the text.
        y - y coordinate to start the drawing of the text.

      • textCentered

        public static void textCentered(java.lang.String textToDraw,
                                java.awt.Font font,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        Draws text on the screen with whatever font the graphics object is using, with the text center at the point x, y. for the given graphics object.
        Parameters:
        textToDraw - Text to draw to the screen.
        x - x coordinate of the text center.
        y - y coordinate of the text center.

      • scaleColor

        public static java.awt.Color scaleColor(java.awt.Color c,
                                        float scale)
        Multiplies each value in a Color object by a constant.
        Parameters:
        c - Base color
        scale - Constant scalar value

      • scaleColor

        public static java.awt.Color scaleColor(java.awt.Color c,
                                        float rscale,
                                        float gscale,
                                        float bscale)
        Multiplies each value in a Color object by a constant. Each color is multiplied by a different constant.
        Parameters:
        c - Base color
        rscale - Constant scalar value for red
        gscale - Constant scalar value for green
        bscale - Constant scalar value for blue
